title: Spicy lentil and spinach salad

For the salad: 75g/2½oz Puy lentils, cooked according to packet instructions, drained and kept warm

steps: For the salad, place the cooked lentils and the spinach into a serving bowl.
For the dressing, place all the dressing ingredients into a bowl and mix well.
To serve, pour the dressing over the lentils and spinach and stir well.
